timeline.title: Research and Development Engineer
achievements: Delivered IoT training and built real-time monitoring demos with Raspberry Pi and Google Cloud.
Accelerated prototyping with reusable 3D-printed modular enclosures used across multiple projects.

timeline.title: Mechatronics Projects
achievements: Built a 6-DOF gesture-controlled robotic arm using OpenCV and Arduino.
Developed AI helmet detection and smart palm tree monitoring with YOLOv8 and cloud dashboards.
